## Goal of this script
After executing this script, one can use Python in an RMarkdown script. 

## Install "pacman" as R package manager and "reticulate" as bridge between R and Python
```{r}
library(pacman)
pacman::p_load(reticulate)
```

## Use python environment "masterarbeit" which has to be created in the first hand (via Anaconda) 
```{r}
use_condaenv(condaenv = "masterarbeit", required = TRUE)
py_config()
```
## Check if 
```{python}
import numpy as np
np.pi
```
